snippet.title: MechWarrior Online - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Want to finally see what the future of the famous robot warfare game MechWarrior looks like? Check out the first gameplay footage of this CryEngine 3 powered mech game which is going free-2-play!

Release Date: Q2 2012
Platforms: X360, PC
Genre: Action Simulation 
Publisher: Infinite Game Publishing
Developer: Piranha Games Smith & Tinker 

Do the robot dance over to IGN for more:
http://pc.ign.com/objects/018/018954.html

Subscribe to IGN's channel for reviews, news, and all things gaming: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=ignentertainment
